Detector.Details: This detector warns about Coupling Client from mutators methods. It is a fast detector.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Limiting Access From Client to Mutator Methods
BugPattern.LongDescription: Limiting Access From Client to Mutator Methods {1} {2} {3}
BugPattern.Details:
Decoupling Client from Mutator Methods

For more information on this see Sun Bug #6231579 and Sun Bug #6178997.
